title: apiout Configuration
description: Configuration schema for apiout - a tool for fetching and serializing API data

apis.description: List of API configurations to fetch

serializers.description: Named serializer configurations for transforming API responses

post_processors.description: List of post-processors to combine and transform API results

api.description: Configuration for a single API call

method.description: Method to call on the client instance

client_id.description: Identifier for sharing client instances across multiple API calls

init_method.description: Method to call once after client instantiation (requires client_id)

init_params.description: Parameters to pass to the client class constructor (requires client_id)

params.description: Parameters to pass to the API method

serializer.description: Reference to a serializer configuration (string) or inline serializer (object)

oneOf.description: Name of a serializer defined in the serializers section

serializer.description: Configuration for serializing API response objects

fields.description: Field mappings from response object to output

oneOf.description: Simple attribute or method name to access
Complex field mapping with method calls, nested fields, or iteration

method.description: Method name to call on the object

count.description: Method or attribute returning the number of items

item.description: Method name that takes an index parameter to get an item

fields.description: Field mappings to extract from each item

module.description: Python module containing the processor class

class.description: Name of the class to instantiate

method.description: Optional method to call on the instantiated class

inputs.description: List of API names or previous post-processor names to use as inputs

serializer.description: Reference to a serializer configuration (string) or inline serializer (object)

oneOf.description: Name of a serializer defined in the serializers section
